data.title: Lawyer Breaks Down 17 More Courtroom Scenes From Film & TV
data.meta_description:
Former prosecutor Lucy Lang is back to take a look at more courtroom scenes from television shows and movies and breaks down how accurate they are.
Lucy Lang is an executive director at the Institute For Innovation In Prosecution at John Jay College of Criminal Justice.
Learn more about Lucy Lang and the Institute for Innovation in Prosecution at http://www.prosecution.org and follow their work on Instagram and Twitter @LucyLangNYC and @iip_johnjay
